channel.title: Martin Menten on AI in Medicine
channel.description: Recent content in Martin Menten on AI in Medicine

item.title: MSc Thesis: Unsupervised deep learning for vessel segmentation in optical coherence tomography angiographs
item.description: Optical coherence tomography angiography (OCTA) is an imaging technique that visualizes blood vessels by detecting motion of red blood cells in sequential scans [1]. It has seen initial adoption for the diagnosis and monitoring of clinical conditions that affect the retinal vasculature, such as several different eye diseases or multiple sclerosis [2, 3].
